column4: How might I go about fixing the "cannot detect if hardware is present" error in ndiswrapper with my netgear wna3100 adapter.
i guess thats a matter up for debate... xfce has gotten very bloated over the last few years.. it's not much different from gnome
i dunno... not really been my experience the last few years...  especially with Ubuntu/Xubuntu... but glad its working for you
